price: Mengapa kamu suruh orang lain (mengerjakan) kebajikan?  Sedang kamu melupakan diri (kewajiban)mu sendiri, padahal kamu membaca Alkitab (Taurat)? Maka tidaklah kamu berpikir?
arabic: ۞ أَتَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبِرِّ وَتَنسَوۡنَ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَتۡلُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: atamurūna al-nāsa bil-biri watansawna anfusakum wa-antum tatlūna al-kitāba afalā taʿqilūna
